name: Crispy Béarnaise Cauliflower
description: Who said meat had to steal the show? Give vegetables their time to shine. Pre-cook the cauli in the microwave to soften it, then crisp it on the grill and lacquer with Béarnaise sauce. It’s a decadently delish way to add more fibre and vitamin C to your meal!

ingredients.name: Bearnaise Sauce Mix or Hollandaise Sauce Mix

preparation: Preheat grill to medium high heat.
Remove outer leaves and stem from cauliflower, leaving the head intact. Place in Multipurpose Steamer; cover and microwave on high 7–8 min.

Meanwhile, melt butter in Multipurpose Pot—8 Cup over medium-high heat. Remove from heat; whisk in sauce mix. While whisking, slowly add water. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer until thickened.
Place cauliflower in 9" aluminum foil pie plate. Pour half of the sauce over top.
Place on grill and immediately turn heat down to low. Cook with lid closed 4–5 min. Pour remaining sauce over top and cook with lid closed for additional 4–5 min, until sauce starts to brown.
tips: No grill? Follow the same cooking instructions as indicated for the grill but cook under a broiler on the middle oven rack.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and a bun—it’s the perfect side for a grilled chicken burger!
